price: Wọ́n sì wí pé: “Fún òun àti arákùnrin rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́,¹ kí o sì rán àwọn akónijọ² sí àwọn ìlú,
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
footnotes:
1. Ọjọ́ ìpàdé náà ni ó jẹyọ nínú sūrah Tọ̄hā; 20:59.
 2. Àwọn ni àwọn ọlọ́pàá Fir‘aon.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-arsil fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
